title: Young MacGyver
resume:
Know the enemy. See the enemy. Fight the enemy, with the enemy.
The Nephew of original MacGyver leaves school and for fun joins the Phoenix Foundation (The guy organisation his uncle belonged to). As expected the "Young MacGyver" finds his talents closely match his uncles. Only the unaired Pilot episode is known to exist.
